sub_title: Advises & build digital transformation solutions  -- Co-Founder @IZ|Regale & YourDocto -- Judge@The Webby
summary:
With over 20 years of digital knowledge, together with my team we advise as well as build development solutions for every challenge.

Our team is experienced and dealt with many exceptional challenges from international projects, and has proven from time to time how to anticipate, consult and produce a practical and substantial solution.

Currently, we are conducting research, giving advice, and/ or developing solutions for:
- Energy Transition Campus Amsterdam
- IKEA
- Netherlands Forensic Institute
- Panasonic
- Polaroid
- Shell
- Van Goud Advocaten

Don't hesitate to share your digital challenge to transform as our collective focus. 
Kindly contact us via khoa@izregale.com to acquaint and we are more than happy to take care of your digital transformation, so you can focus on your core business.

projects.title: 50,000 Facebook likes
projects.description: How to celebrate the next milestone? For example the 50,000th Facebook like? Of course by celebrating with your be loved fans. Therefore DFDS Seaways showed their sincere appreciation by giving 50,000 prices to anyone which wants to participate with the campaign. Next to that a perfect opportunity of DFDS Seaways to thank their Facebook fans.

projects.title: The Body Shop presents: Go Love Yourself
projects.description:
Announcing the reinvention of a beloved classic 

With over 40 years of campaigning, change-making and smashing beauty industry standards (and still going strong), The Body Shop exists to fight for a fairer, more beautiful world.

In 2021, as the world is embroiled in the Covid crisis, the body shop reveals a reinvented, most sustainable & best Body Butter yet. With increased efficiency, 100% recycled packaging and community fair trade ingredients, the revitalised range arrives as a love-letter to bodies all over the globe, for those days when your skin feels dry and in need of a little TLC. 

In order to announce this re-launch in the middle of the pandemic, the Body Shop partnered with Studio Regale to create a digital alternative. The result is an Interactive Editorial that effectively & skillfully communicates all the intricate facets of the new Body Butters.

projects.title: Aēsop presents: Three Aromatique Candles & Other Stories
projects.description:
A stargazing digital voyage at the discovery of Aēsop’s new Aromatique Candles and other stories. 

At the height of the pandemic, while the world was navigating a difficult time, cult skincare brand Aēsop provided a beacon of hope by releasing 3 Aromatique Candles, a distinctly new range of products with scents inspired by cosmology & crafted by the brand’s longtime fragrance collaborator, Barnabé Fillion. 

Aēsop approached Studio Regale with the aim of creating a site introducing the new range as well as other recently released and upcoming products to a selected public around the globe.

The result is a virtual voyage set in a nautical overworld, allowing visitors to immerse themselves in a poetic realm of fragrances, aesthetics & other sensorial offerings.

projects.title: NikeWomen Victory Tour
projects.description: The NikeWomen Victory Tour is the largest women’s event series in the world. Moreover, it celebrates personal victories through sport, inspiring athletes to push themselves and be Better For It. More than 200,000 women worldwide conquered their first half marathon or 10k.

projects.title: Tiger Beer #SayItWithTiger
projects.description: Tiger Beer, Asia’s most iconic beer, to rally the world for a global sharing of greetings during Chinese New Year 2016. People from all over the word shared their greetings. The campaign saw participation from 6 out of 7 continents, and reached a total of 132 million impressions, ultimately sparking off more than 34 million social interactions globally.

projects.title: Ferry Christmas
projects.description: A cosy and warm collaboration between DFDS Seaways and The Salvation Army to create more awareness for the homeless especially during the cold winter days. Next to that a memorable day was organized. Homeless people were invited on board of a ferry of DFDS Seaways. They were able to enjoy a Christmas dinner, live music, getting shaved by a barber and many more things which aren't daily usual.

Knowing how to exceed the digital boundaries, to take on complex technical challenges and fulfill creative dreams. Creating and delivering exceptional brand experiences is the only thing that counts.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Interactive Producer - Digital Project Manager - Product Owner - Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Studio Regale is a creative digital studio based in Amsterdam, combining context-driven design with an agnostic approach to technology to produce memorable experiences and regale audiences. Distinctly independent and joyfully focused on a boutique-style personal approach, Studio Regale helps businesses, institutions, and individuals tackle digital challenges across new media landscapes.

Please feel free to contact us for the following collaborations: 
IDENTITY & BRANDING | CAMPAIGN WEBSITES | DIGITAL EXPERIMENTS | AUGMENTED REALITY | VIRTUAL REALITY | INSTITUTIONAL WEBSITES | SOCIAL MEDIA CAMPAIGNS | APPS | UX & UI RESEARCH | PROTYPE VALIDATION | PLATFORMS
